text.div:
This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

MilitaryRoleType

Definition:
A person playing the role of program eligible under a program based on military status. Discussion:
This CoveredPartyRoleType.code is typically used when the CoveredPartyRole class code is either "program eligible" or "subscriber" and the person's status as a member of the military meets jurisdictional or program criteria (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19812)

This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a MIL
